name: Menacing Prowess
prereq: Golden League Xun Dedication; Expert In Intimidation
summary: Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty.
description:
Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty. When you Demoralize, you can target up to 2 creatures within 30 feet of you at once. If you are a master of Intimidation, you can Demoralize up to 4 creatures at once; if you're legendary, you can Demoralize up to 8 creatures at once.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
